vote.title: To appoint Stephen Sayre, Deputy Chief of Staff, Office of the Mayor, 90 W. Broad Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Central Ohio Transit Authority (COTA) Board of Trustees, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in his official capacity, with a term expiration of April 1, 2028.  (profile attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
To appoint Stephen Sayre, Deputy Chief of Staff, Office of the Mayor, 90 W. Broad Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Central Ohio Transit Authority (COTA) Board of Trustees, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in his official capacity, with a term expiration of April 1, 2028.  (profile attached).
